languages.text: {n}Помолчав немного, Ирлиэт чуть смягчает взгляд.{/n} "Благодарю, элантах. В отличие от меня ты хотя бы смог{mf||ла} сделать выбор. Выбор между вечными мучениями души и забвением".

traits.locale_text: {n}Помолчав немного, Ирлиэт чуть смягчает взгляд.{/n} "Благодарю, элантах. В отличие от меня ты хотя бы смог{mf||ла} сделать выбор. Выбор между вечными мучениями души и забвением".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while. Then her expression softens a little.{/n} "Thank you, elantach. Unlike me, you were at least able to make your choice. The choice between a soul's eternal torment and oblivion."
languages.original_text: {n}Помолчав немного, Ирлиэт чуть смягчает взгляд.{/n} "Благодарю, элантах. В отличие от меня ты хотя бы смог{mf||ла} сделать выбор. Выбор между вечными мучениями души и забвением".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while. Then her expression softens a little.{/n} "Thank you, elantach. Unlike me, you were at least able to make your choice. The choice between a soul's eternal torment and oblivion."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet enmudece durante un rato. Luego su expresión se suaviza un poco.{/n} «Gracias, elantach. A diferencia de mí, al menos tú has sabido tomar una decisión. Has elegido entre el tormento eterno y la liberación del olvido».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while. Then her expression softens a little.{/n} "Thank you, elantach. Unlike me, you were at least able to make your choice. The choice between a soul's eternal torment and oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet enmudece durante un rato. Luego su expresión se suaviza un poco.{/n} «Gracias, elantach. A diferencia de mí, al menos tú has sabido tomar una decisión. Has elegido entre el tormento eterno y la liberación del olvido».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはしばらく黙っていたが、やがて少し表情を和らげた。{/n}「ありがとう、エランタ。我と違って、あなたは少なくとも自分で選択できた。魂を永遠に苦しめるか、それとも忘れ去るか、という選択をね」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while. Then her expression softens a little.{/n} "Thank you, elantach. Unlike me, you were at least able to make your choice. The choice between a soul's eternal torment and oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはしばらく黙っていたが、やがて少し表情を和らげた。{/n}「ありがとう、エランタ。我と違って、あなたは少なくとも自分で選択できた。魂を永遠に苦しめるか、それとも忘れ去るか、という選択をね」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默了一会儿，随后表情变得柔和了些。{/n}“谢谢你，外界人。你不像我，你至少还能自己做出选择，决定这个灵魂是该遭到永恒的折磨，还是该陷入湮灭。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while. Then her expression softens a little.{/n} "Thank you, elantach. Unlike me, you were at least able to make your choice. The choice between a soul's eternal torment and oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特沉默了一会儿，随后表情变得柔和了些。{/n}“谢谢你，外界人。你不像我，你至少还能自己做出选择，决定这个灵魂是该遭到永恒的折磨，还是该陷入湮灭。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet reste silencieuse un instant. Puis, son expression se radoucit quelque peu.{/n} « Merci, elantach. Contrairement à moi, vous avez au moins réussi à faire un choix. Le choix entre le tourment éternel d'une âme et l'oubli. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while. Then her expression softens a little.{/n} "Thank you, elantach. Unlike me, you were at least able to make your choice. The choice between a soul's eternal torment and oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet reste silencieuse un instant. Puis, son expression se radoucit quelque peu.{/n} « Merci, elantach. Contrairement à moi, vous avez au moins réussi à faire un choix. Le choix entre le tourment éternel d'une âme et l'oubli. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schweigt einen Augenblick. Dann wird ihr Gesichtsausdruck weicher.{/n} "Danke, Elantach. Ihr habt es immerhin geschafft, eine Entscheidung zu treffen, nicht so wie ich. Die Entscheidung, ob eine Seele ewige Qualen erleidet oder für ewig vergisst."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while. Then her expression softens a little.{/n} "Thank you, elantach. Unlike me, you were at least able to make your choice. The choice between a soul's eternal torment and oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schweigt einen Augenblick. Dann wird ihr Gesichtsausdruck weicher.{/n} "Danke, Elantach. Ihr habt es immerhin geschafft, eine Entscheidung zu treffen, nicht so wie ich. Die Entscheidung, ob eine Seele ewige Qualen erleidet oder für ewig vergisst."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, bir süre sükûnetini koruyor. Ardından ifadesi bir nebze yumuşuyor.{/n} "Teşekkürler elantach. Bir ruhun ebedî eziyeti ve yok oluşu arasından birini seçtin. En azından benim aksime bir karar verebildin."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is silent for a while. Then her expression softens a little.{/n} "Thank you, elantach. Unlike me, you were at least able to make your choice. The choice between a soul's eternal torment and oblivion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, bir süre sükûnetini koruyor. Ardından ifadesi bir nebze yumuşuyor.{/n} "Teşekkürler elantach. Benim aksime en azından sen bir karar verebildin. Bir ruhun ebedî eziyeti ve yok oluşu arasındaki o karar..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
